options.name: Session
options.description: You choose an ally and spend at least 1 hour before or during a full rest to counsel them in a personal session. The next time the character completes a full rest, they gain an additional 3 resolve.

options.name: Clinical Counselor
options.description: Gain +1 skill with medicine. The target of your Session ability also gains 3 health when they complete a full rest.

options.name: Empathic Counselor
options.description: Gain +1 skill with insight. When the target of your Session ability takes a full rest, you can roll an insight check. If your result is higher than their current stress level, their rest is not penalized by stress.

options.name: Guidance
options.description: Gain +1 skill with persuasion. When an ally makes a check to recover from a stress injury or recover from substance dependency immediately after benefiting from your Session trait, you add one of your persuasion dice into their pool.

options.name: Reaction : Self Talk
options.description: In response to receiving a stress injury, you can make an insight check. On a 4 or higher for a minor injury, 8 or higher for a moderate injury, or 12 or higher for a severe injury, you do not receive the stress injury. This costs 1 energy.

options.name: Action : Encourage
options.description: You provide urgent mental support to an ally within short (10 unit) distance. Make a persuasion check against their current stress level. On success, they can take their next turn without suffering the effects of Confused, Maddened, Afraid, or Charmed conditions. The conditions return at the end of their next turn.

options.name: Professional Detachment
options.description: Your line of work forces you to become detached, strengthening your own mind. Gain +2 psychic mitigation and +2 maximum resolve.

options.name: Psychiatrist
options.description: Gain +1 skill with alchemy. When an ally makes a dependency check within a short (10 unit) distance of you, they do not roll with any penalty dice.

options.name: Group Therapy
options.description: Your Session ability can target two additional allies.

options.name: Daily Reaction : Mantra
options.description: In response to you or an ally within a short (10 unit) distance making a resilience check, you can instead say a practiced mantra by sacrificing a number of your morale. Instead of rolling, the result of the resilience check becomes double how much morale you sacrificed.
